sense.gloss: to approach, to draw near, to come near, to be close to
to gather (in one place), to come together, to meet
to stop by (while on one's way to another place), to drop by, to make a short visit
to grow old, to grow high (number, etc.)
to lean against, to recline on
to push one's opponent while holding their belt
to decide on a price and come to a deal
to be swayed by (a person), to yield to

sdata.j: ↑帰↑↓かえ↓りがけに↑郵便↑↓ゆうびん↓↑局↑↓きょく↓に|↑寄↑↓よ↓る|よ。
sdata.e: I'll call by the post office on the way home.

sdata.j: |↑寄↑↓よ↓る|↑年波↑↓としなみ↓には↑勝↑↓か↓てないんだよ。
sdata.e: No one can turn the clock back.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓が↑立↑↓た↓ち|↑寄↑↓よ↓る|と↑決↑↓き↓まっていつも、うるさくまとわりついてくる。
sdata.e: Every time I drop in to visit, they constantly get in my hair.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑家↑↓いえ↓に↑帰↑↓かえ↓る↑途中↑↓とちゅう↓でその↑本屋↑↓ほんや↓に↑立↑↓た↓ち|↑寄↑↓よ↓る|のが↑常↑↓つね↓であった。
sdata.e: I used to drop in at the bookstore on my way home.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑帰宅↑↓きたく↓の↑途中↑↓とちゅう↓で↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑家↑↓いえ↓に|↑寄↑↓よ↓る|つもりです。
sdata.e: I'm going to drop in at his house on my way home.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑東京↑↓とうきょう↓に↑行↑↓い↓くときいつも↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓の↑家↑↓いえ↓に↑立↑↓た↓ち|↑寄↑↓よ↓る|。
sdata.e: I always drop in at her house when I go to Tokyo.

sdata.j: ↑時間↑↓じかん↓があまりないので、ファーストフード↑店↑↓てん↓に↑立↑↓た↓ち|↑寄↑↓よ↓る|つもりです。
sdata.e: I don't have much time, so I'm going to drop in at a fast-food restaurant.

sdata.j: ↑東京↑↓とうきょう↓のいくつかのホテルに|↑寄↑↓よ↓る|リムジンバスもあります。
sdata.e: There are shuttle buses that stop at several hotels in Tokyo.
